mapper.select: SELECT * FROM plan pl INNER JOIN accompany ac ON pl.accomid = ac.accomid INNER JOIN cust cu ON ac.custid = cu.custid WHERE ac.accomid = #{accomid};

SELECT ac.accomid, pl.planid, pl.planname, pl.idx, pl.todo, FORMAT(pl.planx,6) AS planx, format(pl.plany,6) AS plany, ac.custid, ac.title, ac.accomtext, ac.traveltime, FORMAT(ac.locationx, 6) AS locationx, FORMAT(ac.locationy, 6) AS locationy FROM plan pl INNER JOIN accompany ac ON pl.accomid = ac.accomid WHERE ac.accomid = #{accomid};
